item.title: CISCO SYSTEMS INC 10-K
item.description: CISCO SYSTEMS INC, which is in the Computer Communications Equipment [3576] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 09, 2021 had 38319 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: july - 381 instances 2021 - 374 instances revenue - 250 instances may - 248 instances 2020 - 242 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
